title.narrative: Uganda Support to Municipal Infrastructure Development Program

description.narrative: To enhance institutional capacity of selected municipalities to address urban service delivery gaps

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: Section I.B of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Description: The Recipient shall appoint in each FiscalYear, an Independent Verification Agent, with qualifications, experience and terms and conditions of employment satisfactory to theAssociation, to be responsible for carrying out the Annual Performance Assessment. | Each Fiscal Year.

Finance Agreement: Section I.B of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Description: The Recipient shall by not later than three(3) months after the Effectiveness Date, update, and thereafter, adopt the Program Operational Manual, in form and substancesatisfactory to the Association. | Due Date: November 2018.

Finance Agreement: Section I.B of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Description: The Recipient, through MoLHUD, shallprepare and adopt, not later than March 31 of each Fiscal Year (“FY”) during the implementation of the Program, a PerformanceImprovement Plan (“PIP”) specifying activities to be carried out by said MoLHUD during said FY, and implement said PIP. | Due Date:Each Fiscal Year.

Finance Agreement: Section IV.B of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Description: The Recipient, through the MoLHUD, shallmake withdrawal for any DLR under Categories (7) and (8) unless and until the Association is satisfied that the Recipient has anadequate refugee protection framework. | Due Date: Each Fiscal Year.

title.narrative: Intermediate Result Indicator Five: Municipal LGs with at least 10% annual increase in OSR (Number,
Indicator Two: Percentage of total planned infrastructure completed by participating municipalities.
Intermediate Result indicator One: Roads, street lights and drainage rehabilitated
Indicator Three: Number of project beneficiaries of which x% female
Intermediate Result Indicator Four: Municipal LGs with qualified core staff
Intermediate Result indicator Two: Garbage collected and disposed
Intermediate Result Indicator Eight: Technical support by MoLHUD and implementation of the Program
Intermediate Results Indicator Nine: Municipalities with functional IFMS system in place (Number, Cu

Intermediate Result Indicator Six: Municipal LGs with clean Audit Reports for previous year
Direct Program beneficiaries (number), of which female (percentage)
Technical support by MoLHUD and implementation of the Program action plan to ensure achievement of Program results.
Municipal LGs with qualified core staff
Municipal local economic infrastructure (bus parks, markets, parking lots etc) built or rehabilitated using the urban LDG.
Municipal roads built or rehabilitated with related infrastructure using urban LDG
. Municipal LGs with actual expenditures on O&M more than 75% of the O&M budgeted amount
Municipal LGs with at least 10% annual increase in own source revenue (OSR)
Average annual performance score of participating LGs in the seven thematic areas as assessed by the independent annual performanceassessment
Local infrastructure targets as set out in the annual work plans delivered by municipal LGs utilizing the Program funds.
Municipal LGs with clean audit reports for previous year
Valuation Services strengthened by CGV office
